docs.title: TOGAF® 10 Foundation Notes
docs.text:
Compact, exam-focused notes for the TOGAF Enterprise Architecture Foundation (Part 1).

How to use this

Skim Foundation → Core Concepts and ADM → Overview, then drill into any shaky areas.

docs.title: Syllabus & Exam Facts
docs.text:
• Exam: TOGAF® Enterprise Architecture Foundation (Part 1)
  • Format: 40 MCQs, 60 minutes
  • Pass mark: 60% (24/40)
  • Prerequisites: None
  • Focus: terminology, ADM purposes, artefacts, governance, repository/continuum
